about_the_game:
This wonderful nude beach has been invaded by a horde of women in admittingly fashionable swimsuits, so it's up to a lone naked samurai to enforce the undress code!

In this casual lewd game you must use one hand to slice away the clothing of each girl that is thrown your way. While your other hand is free to relax and catch some sun.

Pick up your trusty sword and slash away those offending swimsuits! But watch out for those sexy looking bombs!

-Adventure Mode (Travel the Beach of Swimsuit Samurai, hone your skills and unlock the power of the blade
-Face new challenges that twist the unique gameplay (Hit targets in 'border patrol', red light green light and many more!)
-Shop Till You Drop (Using your points unlock gallery images of all the girls you undress!
-Dozens of Girls (Strip beach babes, pirates, space soldiers and more!)
-Challenge other Samurai with online leaderboards!
-Boss Battles! (Fight your way through creative and fun boss fights!)
-Endless Mode (How long can you hold out?)
-An original soundtrack (mixing traditional Japanese instruments with reggae and beach party tunes!)

content_descriptors.notes:
Swimsuit Samurai Contains
(Veiled nudity, full frontal nudity, sexual poses and positions. )
All characters in game are 18+ over

name: Swimsuit Samurai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb Video Memory
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb Video Memory
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition
